Summary: Three Amber Lights in triangle formation.
trends: There have been 30 other sightings in Longmont
There were no other sightings in Longmont on or around June 28th 2013
divs: sighting detailsafter a gorgeous sunset, june 28, 2013. incoming rainstorm from n\e, i, riding bicycle eastbound on st vrain greenway near airport, pass couple w\ 2 dogs, say "hi", they say: "nice night"; i reply "nice night to see some ufo's" we laugh... next passed by cyclist who says "enjoy the show"... mild lightning flashes all around, occasional vertical big bolt... heavy downpour, then decreases, i ride through 'roger's grove', notice two amber orbs, one above the other near southern skyline... i begin ringing bicycle bell and pointing & waving at them, hoping to draw attention. i continue on path toward boulder fairgrounds... orbs appear to be hovering, not static. joined at their lower left by third to complete triangle formation. apparent movement in relation to each other; blinking, flashing, shrinking\growing(?) demonstrate non threatening 'playful vibe'.... i cross roger rd approaching rear of fairgrounds, i hum\sing\chant a tune, hear small party of revelers near a pickup truck; no longer able to see orbs, i circle behind fairgrounds, mentally 'invite' them down to the dirt lot, and then !boom\crack! above me, loud thunderbolt with no direct lightening. i say "ok, fine, see ya later", turn north, go back to the greenway trail & go home. *this morning i searched youtube site for: 'ufo longmont'... several entries from years past look nearly identical... also 'ufo lafayette' shows three red lights using same triangle form. **note: these are clearly distinguishable (to me) as seperate entities making a triangle shape, unlike the huge black triangle that i saw several years ago block out the starlight as it passed over louisville \ lafayette. that was one big solid triangle, with a silent & kind of ominous vibe. ~peace~ aj
